name: CreateWebhookSubscription
description:
Creates a webhook subscription.

Use this tool to establish a webhook subscription for receiving event notifications from the service.

parameters.name: unique_request_identifier
parameters.description: A unique string to ensure the idempotence of the CreateWebhookSubscription request, preventing duplicate entries.

value_schema.description: A unique string that identifies the [CreateWebhookSubscription](api-endpoint:WebhookSubscriptions-CreateWebhookSubscription) request.

parameters.name: subscription_unique_id
parameters.description: A Square-generated unique ID for the webhook subscription.

value_schema.description: A Square-generated unique ID for the subscription.

parameters.name: subscription_name
parameters.description: The name for the webhook subscription.

value_schema.description: The name of this subscription.

parameters.name: event_types
parameters.description: An array of event types for the subscription, each as a string.

value_schema.description: The event types associated with this subscription.

parameters.name: webhook_notification_url
parameters.description: The URL where webhook notifications will be sent. Ensure it is accessible and accurately formatted.

value_schema.description: The URL to which webhooks are sent.

parameters.name: api_version
parameters.description: Specifies the API version for the webhook subscription. Optional; defaults to the application's current API version if not provided.

value_schema.description:
The API version of the subscription.
This field is optional for `CreateWebhookSubscription`. 
The value defaults to the API version used by the application.

parameters.name: subscription_signature_key
parameters.description: The Square-generated signature key used to validate the origin of the webhook event.

value_schema.description: The Square-generated signature key used to validate the origin of the webhook event.

parameters.name: subscription_created_at
parameters.description: The creation timestamp of the subscription in RFC 3339 format, e.g., "2016-09-04T23:59:33.123Z".

value_schema.description: The timestamp of when the subscription was created, in RFC 3339 format. For example, "2016-09-04T23:59:33.123Z".

parameters.name: subscription_last_updated_timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp of when the subscription was last updated, in RFC 3339 format (e.g., '2016-09-04T23:59:33.123Z').

value_schema.description:
The timestamp of when the subscription was last updated, in RFC 3339 format.
For example, "2016-09-04T23:59:33.123Z".

parameters.name: enable_subscription
parameters.description: Indicates whether the subscription is enabled (`true`) or not (`false`).

value_schema.description: Indicates whether the subscription is enabled (`true`) or not (`false`).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: idempotency_key
parameters.description: A unique string that identifies the [CreateWebhookSubscription](api-endpoint:WebhookSubscriptions-CreateWebhookSubscription) request.

value_schema.description: A unique string that identifies the [CreateWebhookSubscription](api-endpoint:WebhookSubscriptions-CreateWebhookSubscription) request.

parameters.name: subscription.id
parameters.description: A Square-generated unique ID for the subscription.

value_schema.description: A Square-generated unique ID for the subscription.

parameters.name: subscription.name
parameters.description: The name of this subscription.

value_schema.description: The name of this subscription.

parameters.name: subscription.enabled
parameters.description: Indicates whether the subscription is enabled (`true`) or not (`false`).

value_schema.description: Indicates whether the subscription is enabled (`true`) or not (`false`).

parameters.name: subscription.event_types
parameters.description: The event types associated with this subscription.

value_schema.description: The event types associated with this subscription.

parameters.name: subscription.notification_url
parameters.description: The URL to which webhooks are sent.

value_schema.description: The URL to which webhooks are sent.

parameters.name: subscription.api_version
parameters.description:
The API version of the subscription.
This field is optional for `CreateWebhookSubscription`. 
The value defaults to the API version used by the application.

value_schema.description:
The API version of the subscription.
This field is optional for `CreateWebhookSubscription`. 
The value defaults to the API version used by the application.

parameters.name: subscription.signature_key
parameters.description: The Square-generated signature key used to validate the origin of the webhook event.

value_schema.description: The Square-generated signature key used to validate the origin of the webhook event.

parameters.name: subscription.created_at
parameters.description: The timestamp of when the subscription was created, in RFC 3339 format. For example, "2016-09-04T23:59:33.123Z".

value_schema.description: The timestamp of when the subscription was created, in RFC 3339 format. For example, "2016-09-04T23:59:33.123Z".

parameters.name: subscription.updated_at
parameters.description:
The timestamp of when the subscription was last updated, in RFC 3339 format.
For example, "2016-09-04T23:59:33.123Z".

value_schema.description:
The timestamp of when the subscription was last updated, in RFC 3339 format.
For example, "2016-09-04T23:59:33.123Z".

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
